# Choose Slim protocol
!define TEST_SYSTEM {slim}

!1 Numeric Comparison
!|FEEL Expression Fixture                                     |
|expression|output?                                           |
|1 = 2     |Relational(=,NumericLiteral(1),NumericLiteral(2)) |
|1 != 2    |Relational(!=,NumericLiteral(1),NumericLiteral(2))|
|1 < 2     |Relational(<,NumericLiteral(1),NumericLiteral(2)) |
|1 <= 2    |Relational(<=,NumericLiteral(1),NumericLiteral(2))|
|1 > 2     |Relational(>,NumericLiteral(1),NumericLiteral(2)) |
|1 >= 2    |Relational(>=,NumericLiteral(1),NumericLiteral(2))|

!1 Null Comparison

|expression                                   |output?                                                                            |
|1 = null                                     |Relational(=,NumericLiteral(1),NullLiteral())                                      |

|"abc" = null                                 |Relational(=,StringLiteral("abc"),NullLiteral())                                   |
|null = "abc"                                 |Relational(=,NullLiteral(),StringLiteral("abc"))                                   |
|"abc" != null                                |Relational(!=,StringLiteral("abc"),NullLiteral())                                  |
|null != "abc"                                |Relational(!=,NullLiteral(),StringLiteral("abc"))                                  |

|null != true                                 |Relational(!=,NullLiteral(),BooleanLiteral(true))                                  |
|date("2016-03-01") = null                    |Relational(=,DateTimeLiteral(date, "2016-03-01"),NullLiteral())                    |
|null == date("2016-03-01")                   |Relational(==,NullLiteral(),DateTimeLiteral(date, "2016-03-01"))                   |
|date("2016-03-01") != null                   |Relational(!=,DateTimeLiteral(date, "2016-03-01"),NullLiteral())                   |
|null != date("2016-03-01")                   |Relational(!=,NullLiteral(),DateTimeLiteral(date, "2016-03-01"))                   |
|time("12:00:00Z") = null                     |Relational(=,DateTimeLiteral(time, "12:00:00Z"),NullLiteral())                     |

!1 Between Expressions
!|FEEL Expression Fixture                                                                          |
|expression             |output?                                                                   |
|3 between 1 and 4      |BetweenExpression(NumericLiteral(3), NumericLiteral(1), NumericLiteral(4))|
|(i) between (a) and (b)|BetweenExpression(Name(i), Name(a), Name(b))                              |
|(i) between 1 and 2    |BetweenExpression(Name(i), NumericLiteral(1), NumericLiteral(2))          |

!1 In Expressions
!|FEEL Expression Fixture                                                                                                                                                                                                             |
|expression             |output?                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|1 in 1                 |InExpression(NumericLiteral(1), OperatorTest(null,NumericLiteral(1)))                                                                                                                                        |
|1 in <1                |InExpression(NumericLiteral(1), OperatorTest(<,NumericLiteral(1)))                                                                                                                                           |
|1 in <=1               |InExpression(NumericLiteral(1), OperatorTest(<=,NumericLiteral(1)))                                                                                                                                          |
|1 in >1                |InExpression(NumericLiteral(1), OperatorTest(>,NumericLiteral(1)))                                                                                                                                           |
|1 in >=1               |InExpression(NumericLiteral(1), OperatorTest(>=,NumericLiteral(1)))                                                                                                                                          |
|1 in (1..2)            |InExpression(NumericLiteral(1), IntervalTest(true,NumericLiteral(1),true,NumericLiteral(2)))                                                                                                                 |
|1 in (1..2]            |InExpression(NumericLiteral(1), IntervalTest(true,NumericLiteral(1),false,NumericLiteral(2)))                                                                                                                |
|1 in [1..2)            |InExpression(NumericLiteral(1), IntervalTest(false,NumericLiteral(1),true,NumericLiteral(2)))                                                                                                                |
|1 in [1..2]            |InExpression(NumericLiteral(1), IntervalTest(false,NumericLiteral(1),false,NumericLiteral(2)))                                                                                                               |
|1 in [1, 2]            |InExpression(NumericLiteral(1), ListTest(ListLiteral(NumericLiteral(1),NumericLiteral(2))))                                                                                                                  |
|1 in (1)               |InExpression(NumericLiteral(1), OperatorTest(null,NumericLiteral(1)))                                                                                                                                        |
|1 in (1, 2)            |InExpression(NumericLiteral(1), OperatorTest(null,NumericLiteral(1)), OperatorTest(null,NumericLiteral(2)))                                                                                                  |
|1 in (<1, [1..2], 1, 2)|InExpression(NumericLiteral(1), OperatorTest(<,NumericLiteral(1)), IntervalTest(false,NumericLiteral(1),false,NumericLiteral(2)), OperatorTest(null,NumericLiteral(1)), OperatorTest(null,NumericLiteral(2)))|
